title: Flower of Fire
summaries: The Flower of Fire is a pre-Hardmode, post-Skeletron magic weapon that launches a slow, non-piercing Ball of Fire that ricochets up to five (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / four (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) times, dissipating on the sixth (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / fifth (Old-gen console and 3DS versions). Upon contact with an enemy, the Balls of Fire have a 1/2 (50%) chance to inflict the On Fire! debuff for a duration of 5 seconds. The Flower of Fire has a (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 1/5 (20%) / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 1/6 (16.67%) chance of being obtained from Shadow Chests in The Underworld, and has a 1/5 (20%) chance of being found in Obsidian Lock Boxes(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) obtained from Obsidian(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) and Hellstone Crates(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions).
